services.gui

Class ImportExportService

  • java.lang.Object
    • services.gui.ImportExportService

  • @Singleton
public class ImportExportService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class for JATOS Controllers (not Publix).

    • Method Detail

      • importStudy

        public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode importStudy(User loggedInUser,
                                                                  java.io.File file)
                                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                  ForbiddenException
        Import a uploaded JATOS study archive (.jzip file) There are 5 possible cases: (udir - name of uploaded study asset dir, cdir - name of current study asset dir)

        1) study exists - udir exists - udir == cdir : ask confirmation to overwrite study and/or dir 2) study exists - udir exists - udir != cdir : ask confirmation to overwrite study and/or (dir && rename to cdir) 3) study exists - !udir exists : shouldn't happen, ask confirmation to overwrite study 4) !study exists - udir exists : ask to rename dir (generate new dir name) 5) !study exists - !udir exists : new study - write both

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        ForbiddenException

      • importStudyConfirmed

        public void importStudyConfirmed(User loggedInUser,
                                 boolean keepProperties,

      • cleanupAfterStudyImport

        public void cleanupAfterStudyImport()

      • createStudyExportZipFile

        public java.io.File createStudyExportZipFile(Study study)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a JATOS study archive (suffix .jzip). It basically zips a study and returns the File object with the name 'study.jzip' (located in the system's temp directory). The JATOS study archive will contain the study assets' directory and the study's JSON data (a .jas file).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
